message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $120. It's a great opportunity to get a high-quality item at a reasonable price.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the quality of your product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $105 for the product.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I appreciate your offer. In light of your proposal, I would like to counter with an offer of $110 for the product. This price reflects its value while also considering your willingness to pay.
Thank you for your response, Alice. I understand your position. However, I would like to counter with an offer of $107 for the product. I hope this aligns better with both our interests.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. Considering the value of the product and your offer, I am willing to accept $108 for the product. This price reflects a fair compromise between our interests.
